text: Willemetia is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family.Necker, Nöel Martin Joseph de. 1777. Willemetia Nouveau Genre de Plantes 1.Tropicos, Willemetia Neck. It is native to Europe, Iran and the Caucasus. ; Species * Willemetia stipitata (Jacq.) Dalla Torre \- Central Europe (France, Germany, Italy, Serbia, etc.)Altervista Flora Italiana, Lattugaccio palustre, Willemetia stipitata (Jacq.) Dalla Torre includes photos and European distribution map * Willemetia tuberosa Fisch. & C.A.Mey. ex DC. \- Iran, Caucasus ==References== Category:Cichorieae Category:Flora of Europe Category:Flora of Iran Category:Flora of the Caucasus Category:Asteraceae genera
title: Willemetia
